beta2mass.py

geminids.beta2mass.asteroidal(b)

Calculates the mass the corresponds to each beta value assuming an asteroidal profile as defined in Wilck and Mann (1996)

Parameters

b (ndarray) – The beta values of the particles

Returns

mass (ndarray, g) – The corresponding masses of each of the particles

geminids.beta2mass.young_comet(b)

Calculates the mass the corresponds to each beta value assuming an young_cometary profile as defined in Wilck and Mann (1996)

Parameters

b (ndarray) – The beta values of the particles

Returns

mass (ndarray, g) – The corresponding masses of each of the particles
